subject: Re: OT: Directory Services and linux
body: 67 (return) [ In Philostorgius (l. iii. c. 15) the character and adventures of ®tius appear singular enough, though they are carefully softened by the hand of a friend. The editor, Godefroy, (p. 153,) who was more attached to his principles than to his author, has collected the odious circumstances which his various adversaries have preserved or invented.]
